level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this chapter, consideration shall be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 21 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
